name: Out of this world - Slam Jam 2
name_original: Out of this world - Slam Jam 2
description:
Use gravity and your ships thrusters to navigate to the wormhole. Bend, Slingshot or plumber to the goal. The only obstacle is anything else in space.

Left mouse button to thrust in that direction, but be careful you only have so much fuel per round. 

Mouse wheel to zoom in and out

1-4 to change the speed of the game

Q to scan for planets

R to reset
